argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lsppreli.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lsppreli.p | |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lsppreli.t | |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) |
| 4 |  | lsppreli.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 5 |  | lsppreli.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 6 |  | lsppreli.n | |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) |
| 7 |  | lsppreli.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 8 |  | lsppreli.a | |- ( ph -> A e. K ) |
| 9 |  | lsppreli.b | |- ( ph -> B e. K ) |
| 10 |  | lsppreli.x | |- ( ph -> X e. V ) |
| 11 |  | lsppreli.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) |
| 12 | 1, 6 | #P_lspsnsubg | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( N ` { X } ) e. ( SubGrp ` W ) ) |
| 13 | 7, 10, 12 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X } ) e. ( SubGrp ` W ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 6 | #P_lspsnsubg | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ Y e. V ) -> ( N ` { Y } ) e. ( SubGrp ` W ) ) |
| 15 | 7, 11, 14 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( N ` { Y } ) e. ( SubGrp ` W ) ) |
| 16 | 1, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 10 | #P_lspsneli | |- ( ph -> ( A .x. X ) e. ( N ` { X } ) ) |
| 17 | 1, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 9, 11 | #P_lspsneli | |- ( ph -> ( B .x. Y ) e. ( N ` { Y } ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LSSum ` W ) = ( LSSum ` W ) |
| 19 | 2, 18 | #P_lsmelvali | |- ( ( ( ( N ` { X } ) e. ( SubGrp ` W ) /\ ( N ` { Y } ) e. ( SubGrp ` W ) ) /\ ( ( A .x. X ) e. ( N ` { X } ) /\ ( B .x. Y ) e. ( N ` { Y } ) ) ) -> ( ( A .x. X ) .+ ( B .x. Y ) ) e. ( ( N ` { X } ) ( LSSum ` W ) ( N ` { Y } ) ) ) |
| 20 | 13, 15, 16, 17, 19 | #P_syl22anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( A .x. X ) .+ ( B .x. Y ) ) e. ( ( N ` { X } ) ( LSSum ` W ) ( N ` { Y } ) ) ) |
| 21 | 1, 6, 18, 7, 10, 11 | #P_lsmpr | |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X , Y } ) = ( ( N ` { X } ) ( LSSum ` W ) ( N ` { Y } ) ) ) |
| 22 | 20, 21 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ph -> ( ( A .x. X ) .+ ( B .x. Y ) ) e. ( N ` { X , Y } ) ) |
